named-query.name: BC_FIND_STORE_BY_STORE_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT store FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.store.domain.Store store WHERE store.name = :storeName

named-query.name: BC_FIND_ALL_STORES
named-query.query: SELECT store FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.store.domain.Store store WHERE (store.archiveStatus.archived IS NULL OR store.archiveStatus.archived = :archived)

named-query.name: BC_FIND_ALL_STORES_BY_STATE
named-query.query: SELECT store FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.store.domain.Store store WHERE store.address.isoCountrySubdivision = :state AND (store.archiveStatus.archived IS NULL OR store.archiveStatus.archived = :archived)
